DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study assess efficacy safety tadalafil 5 mg administer day patient erectile dysfunction ( ED ) naïve PDE5 ( phosphodiesterase type 5 ) inhibitor . Patients may dose reduce 2.5mg base tolerability .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Tadalafil Once Day Men With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: You male age least 18 year . Have history erectile dysfunction ( ED ) ( define consistent inability achieve and/or maintain erection sufficient permit satisfactory sexual intercourse ) least 3 month duration . Agree use treatment ED , include herbal overthecounter ( OTC ) medication , study You agree make least four sexual intercourse attempt female sexual study partner 4week runin period without medication Your entry laboratory test result medical test meet study requirement You agree use study drug instruct study doctor staff return unused study drug container end study otherwise instruct study doctor . If currently use cholesterol lower medication ( example : statin ) medication low blood pressure ( example : angiotensinconverting enzyme ( ACE ) inhibitor calcium channel blocker medication ) , need stable dose study doctor expect dose change study . You receive previous current treatment tadalafil PDE5 inhibitor . Currently receive treatment doxazosin , nitrate , cancer chemotherapy , antiandrogens ( except finasteride e.g . Propecia™ Proscar® , dutasteride e.g . Avodart® ) . You significant heart disease determine doctor charge study member doctor 's staff . Have history significant central nervous system injury ( include stroke spinal cord injury ) within last 6 month . Have history loss vision one eye nonarteritic anterior ischemic optic neuropathy ( NAION ) , regardless whether episode connection previous PDE5 inhibitor exposure .
